message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not quite comfortable with $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $82.50. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to make a bit of a compromise, but I'm still looking to save as much as I can. Can you consider this price?
